original_text:
Whoever is slow to anger is better than the mighty,
    and he who rules his spirit than he who takes a city.
korean_text: 노하기를 더디하는 자는 용사보다 낫고 자기의 마음을 다스리는 자는 성을 빼앗는 자보다 나으니라

sentences.original_text: Whoever is slow to anger is better than the mighty
sentences.korean_translation: 노하기를 더디 하는 자는 용사보다 낫다

sentences.original_text: and he who rules his spirit
is better than he who takes a city.
